text: @realDonaldTrump I have news for you: NOBODY wants you to be president anyway. Your numbers are beneath the toilet dwelling among the shit of the earth! Even republican voters are being smacked into awareness over this Covid-19 mishandling debacle! Smart people do not vote for scum of the earth!
